notes:
Implemented the Main Visualizer Component (Feature 11) - the top-level React component that orchestrates all modules. Key implementation details:

1. Component accepts `text` prop and triggers SemanticPipeline analysis on change
2. Component accepts `audioStream` prop (ArrayBuffer or ReadableStream) and creates AudioAdapter/AudioAnalyzer chain
3. Renders canvas via CanvasRenderer mounted to container div
4. Controls interface is optional (showControls prop)
5. Config prop supports width, height, theme, and initialControlState
6. Exposes imperative ref methods: pause(), resume(), getState()
7. Gracefully handles missing audio (text-only mode) or missing text (audio-only mode)
8. Properly cleans up all resources on unmount (renderer, primitives, audio modules, mood mapper)
9. Supports custom className and style props with proper merging
10. Emits onMoodChange callback when semantic analysis produces new mood
11. SSR-safe with `typeof window !== 'undefined'` check before browser APIs

Data flow:
- text -> SemanticPipeline -> MoodMapper -> palette/params -> Spectrogram + Typography
- audioStream -> AudioAdapter -> AudioAnalyzer -> frequency data -> Spectrogram
- Controls -> controlState -> apply intensity/motion/mode to primitives
